transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Hanji.
Customer: Haan sir. Prabhat baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se kaise hain sir aap?
Executive: Ji badhiya sir.
Customer: Ji ji sir. Mai keh raha tha sir ye product ke related sir aap baat hui thi na sir aapne bola tha thoda sa feedback diya tha ki pura matlab aapko bilkul paisa isme waste of money lag raha hai kuch business nahi mil raha hai IndiaMART se.
Executive: Ji ji ji bilkul. Ji.
Customer: To matlab lagbhag sir aap aath nau mahine use kar chuke hain services ko to kahan par matlab kami reh gayi sir hum to aapko regular services de rahe hain. Buyleads vagerah use aap thoda sa jyada bataiye.
Executive: Main batata hu. Main batata hu sir aapko kya kami reh gayi. Pehle to buyleads sir school ki tie belt ka bilkul nahi aaya. Mere badges vagerah ki manufacturing hai badges ki buyleads nahi aayi aur jo buyleads aa rahi thi uske andar sir quantity itni kam thi ki jiske andar main chah ke bhi matlab deal nahi kar sakta.
Executive: Achha thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai. Ab jaise aapko main badges ke bare mein samjhata hu. Ab jaise badges ke liye sir die banti hai kisi bhi cheez ki. Ab wo paanch chhah hazaar rupaye ki to sir die banti hai. Ab uske andar aap 50 piece 30 piece ki mere paas wo aa rahi hai quantity. Aise ek jane ke liye maine unpe trust karke unke liye die banwai thi. Unki normal die thi jyada kharcha nahi tha to bhi lagbhag mere 2500 rupaye lage. Uske baad unki sampling cost mein lagbhag 1500 1600 rupaye lage uske baad unhone bol diya ki mere ko pasand nahi aaya main nahi karunga. Banwana hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm. Kyun? Kyunki die charge aur wo sunke unhone mana kar diya. Thik hai. Ab is quantity mein haan ab ye jo charges lagte hain iske sath mein sir kaam nahi ho pata. Pehli cheez ki quantity bahut low aa rahi hai. Dusri cheez jaise school ki tie belt hai usme bhi sir yahi dikkat hai uske design charge vagerah sab itne jane ke baad mein thik hai ab inka 100 piece ka bhi order nahi aata. Minimum 100 piece ke regarding aa rahi hai. Thik hai aur kuch mere paas aise aa rahe hain ki jinke mere paas regular phone aa rahe hain ki sir aap niwar banate hain ji banate hain aap apna dead stock de dijiye humko.
Executive: Sir deal kahan karte hain aap local mein karte hain pan India mein karte hain?
Customer: Pan India karta hu sir main.
Executive: Pan India to sir ek kaam kijiye na buyleads ko aap ek us pe bhi search kiya kijiye system se use karte hain na buyleads ko.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aapne trade.indiamart.com kholiye usse bhi aap buyleads dekh sakte hain. Waise bhi main dekhta hu bahut search hoke leads aati aa rahi hai. Aur aapke jitne bhi manager aaye the sir unka baar baar ek hi kehna tha abhi tak jab se maine use lena beech mein use liya tha maine fir jab se use nahi liya hai aapki profile thik karte hain aapki profile thik karte hain. Sir meri abhi tak yahi samajh mein nahi aaya itne din se abhi tak profile hi thik ho rahi hai abhi ek mam ka bhi phone aaya tha naam bhul gaya main wo bhi ek hi cheez keh rahe the aap apni profile bata do profile thik kar dete hain. Maine pichli baar mein bhi last mein teen chaar baat ek hi cheez samjhai thi isko aise aise wo matlab mere according maine bata diya tha lekin waisa unhone kabhi kiya hi nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Hai na to is vajah se fir mera thoda sa ye ho gaya ki fir koi matlab hi nahi hai use lene ka jab kuch ye kar hi nahi rahe hain to.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir bilkul aap thik keh rahe hain dekho product hai na thoda sa aapko shayad samajh mein aaya hoga aapne jaise nahi wo nahi samajh mein aayega usko baki aapne brass item bhi dal rakhe hain na.
Customer: Bilkul brass item. Aisa bhi hai na sir. Sir brass item ko aa rahi hai ek piece aa rahi hai sir ghar ke use ke liye. Abhi ek wo deal ho rahi thi unhone bahut din kiya mere ko 100 piece bol ke fir bolte hain sir ek piece chahiye. Aap ek kaam karo ek piece bhej do. Ki mere to sir shop thodi hai main to ghar se bhejta hu maine kaha fir aapne 100 piece ka kyun bola tha ki sir main dekh raha tha kya piece aati hai manufacturing cost mein ab aap bataiye sir.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. Sir isliye aapka filter handle kar raha hai isme bulk ka filter lagate hain bulk mein dekho paanch piece do piece kuch kuch.
Customer: Wahi to main aapko samjhane ki koshish kar raha hu sir mera kaam kya actually mein bulk ka hai. Hai na to retail mein sir mere liye matlab ye wo kam quantity mein mere liye sir possible nahi hai.
Executive: Sir local mein aap deal karte hain to sir isko TrustSeal mein kyun nahi upgrade kara liya aapne samay rehte TrustSeal aap kara lenge to aapko bahut jyada benefit aapko mil jaati hai.
Customer: Ye ye word bhi main aapse pehli baar sun raha hu. Last time premium bhi hota hai iska wo bhi mujhe kisi ne nahi bataya tha sir.
Executive: Matlab ye nahi rahega thoda sa main ye suggest karta hu customer ko agar aap TrustSeal kara lenge to ye thoda fayda rahega ki chalo yaar.
Customer: Nahi sir maine pucha tha unse jitna bhi tha unhone mere ko yahi plan bataya tha to maine plan karwa liya tha sir. Baki mujhe koi issue nahi tha mere ko to sir mere ko bulk order chahiye.
Executive: Customer ko requirement hai uske hisab se aap customer ko batana hai ye dekho koi bhi plan lene ke liye basic to lena hi padta but TrustSeal combo pack mein kya hota hai ki ye pack aap lete ho do saal ka do saal ke TrustSeal free mil jata hai usse fayda kya hota hai top par naam aata hai local area mein aur pan India mein top 10 mein to samne se call visibility achi badhti hai premium services mein.
Customer: Sir main wo mere ko ek cheez ye bhi nahi batai gayi thi plan dusre aur secondly hai na mera kya actually mein manufacturing hai UP mein Aligarh wahan pe bhi GST firm registered hai mere naam pe proprietor main hi hu.
Executive: Ab dekh lijiye customer aap dalenge upar mein TrustSeal ka logo ek yellow colour ka customer ka.
Customer: Ji bilkul main aapko wahi bata raha hu aap school ki tie belt brass mein badges mein agar aap search karenge na to India mein top one pe do wo do hi jagah aayegi UP mein Aligarh aur Delhi Delhi jisme bhi Delhi bilkul aayegi sir.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Thoda sa main ek kaam karta hu na video meeting par aaiye main ek baar isko samjhata hu TrustSeal mein kuch profile mein kuch aisa correction karne layak hai.
Customer: Main abhi thoda sa doctor ke idhar hu. Thik hai agar apan kal baat kar sake to main aapko call kar saku aap apna number de dijiye isi number pe call ho jayegi aapko.
Executive: Haan main aapko number apna de raha hu. Haan aap number de dijiye.
Customer: 98979822. Ji ek second bhaiya main likh raha hu. Sir main 10 saal se kaam kar raha hu to mujhe shayad thoda sa nahi nahi mujhe shayad har cheez pata hai lekin shayad main jyada better tarike se aapka problem ko samajh paun. Kyunki mere under mein jo bhi call kare mere under mein team rehti hai maine wahi dekha kal aapne feedback nahi diya tha maine socha ek baar baat karke dekhta hu ki aakhir kya problem hai abhi to renewal mein to khair time hai January end ya February mein abhi bhi aapke do teen mahine agar sahi se kaam karte hain main samjha paun main ye nahi bolunga aap abhi upgrade kara lo but basic mein karo agar renewal ke samay aapko lage to aap TrustSeal ki taraf jana ya to ek option ye kar dunga ek mahine service aur use karo mere hisab se do mahine ka paisa bachega agar aapko lagega do mahine ka minus kara dunga aapka aur TrustSeal ki taraf aap move kar dena but ek mahine mere hisab se aap services dekho.
Customer: Dekho main ye agar aapke karne se aap jaisa keh rahe hain agar thik ho jata hai to main TrustSeal mein move karke aapka premium plan bhi le lunga but ek hi condition hogi uske andar meri firm na UP wali registered karwaunga fir.
Executive: Sir bilkul bilkul thik hai karwa lenge. IndiaMART kharab nahi hai to aap.
Customer: Nahi IndiaMART ko main dosh nahi de raha sir IndiaMART ko main bol hi nahi raha kyunki haan jo main samjhana chah raha tha aapke jitne bhi aaye kisi ne bhi nahi samjha.
Executive: Mujhe ye bhi lag raha hai ki jaise aapne bataya to unhone upar upar nikal gaya unke dimag se unhone bas suna hoga aur jo catalog unhone kya kiya hoga bas photo photo thik kar di hogi aapke description thik kar diya hoga chale gaye honge but exact jaise dawaiyon mein kya hota hai salt ke naam se mapping hoti hai man lijiye aapke products mein exact ye samajhna padega dekho quantity to hum kuch nahi kar sakte lekin kya pata hum kuch product aapke competitor ka research karke video meeting mein sath mein hum dono baithenge video meeting par samjhenge ek do competitor fir uske baad 50 product add on karenge aapko bata dunga to shayad kuch improvement ho jaye kam se kam ek baar thik ho jayega kuch kuch profile 50 60% thik hai brass wala jo die wala jo aap bata rahe ho na wo ek baar thik karna padega ki usme kaise kar sakte hain in cheezon ko.
Customer: Uska maine inko direct bola tha agar aap chaho to mere sare products hata ke aap keval badges rakh do brass ke aluminium vagerah ke aur dusra mera to keval tie belt rakh do baki sari cheez hata do aap. No issue. Nahi nahi sir abhi mainly kaam mera isi ka hai meri manufacturing jo mainly hai in do cheez ki hai ye. Aap baki wali cheez hi hata do bas. School ki tie belt aur main brass ke badges shoulder badge jo matlab aap samajhte hain wo police walon ke IPS vagerah likha hota hai bilkul shoulder badge stars main ye sab main deal karta hu police ke wo police walon ki jo belt ke bakkal hote hain wo. Haan haan haan haan. Ye haan ye wali cheez ki manufacturing sir aur dusra hai mera school ke actually mein tie aur belt ka. School ki school ke shoulder aur tie belt keval school ke school ke tie belt hote hain na. Keval school ke keval school ke sir pan India ab kya hai actually mein school ke tie belt ke liye main waise aap wo sab chhodo koi mere se puchta bhi nahi aap kya karte hain agar main school ka tie belt batata hu to har kisi ki samajh mein bhi nahi aata aur unko ye lagta hai ki ye yuhi matlab koi chhota mota kaam hai but actually mein market market size hai na ab aapko main ek.
Executive: Tender mil jate hain to kitna better aapko business milega khud soch rahe ho aap. Haan ab aap khud hi samajh gaye sir pure India mein school kitne hain bache kitne hain. School wala hum log aisa target karenge kuch tenders mil jaye kuch bade bade schools ke private schools ke to aapka kaam hota rahega saal mein paanch chhe schools ke tender mil jate hain aur uske baad aapko to saal bhar mein do teen lakh rupaye ka turnover to minimum bata raha hu utna to waise hi jayega ab ek school mein kitne bache padhte hain aapka to contract ho jayega jo commission school ka banega wo karenge us hisab se aapko marketing mein aise aise kahenge. Main aapko wahi bata raha tha aur school ki jo meri supply hai na. Har saal school mein change bhi hote hain school mein aisa nahi ki ek dress chalta hai ek school mein do har saal change hote hain. Aap na abhi jo mainly chal raha hai na main school ke sath sath main dukan walon ko bhi mainly supply kar raha hu jo ki ye school uniform shop dekhi hongi aapne. Inke paas mere tie belt jate hain aur socks ki trading karta hu main socks bhi jate hain inke paas kya actually mein 10 15 school pakad ke ye ek dukan wala kaam karta hai. Haan ab UP mein bhi aap man lijiye local mein bhi kar rahe hain UP mein Aligarh ho gaya Aligarh mein itne schools hain. Uttar Pradesh chhod rakha hai maine sir Uttar Pradesh chhod rakha hai Uttar Pradesh mein margin bilkul khich raha hai. Noida mein itne school hai Noida mein main ja raha hu itne mahange mahange school hain ab wo log thodi na ki yahan ke manufacturer se mangwate hain ab man lo school mein award dena hai to Muradabad ke customer ko pakad liya kisi ko aur ek kaam kar mujhe na itne award saal bhar mein bana ke do wo saste mein de rahe hain school ka apna aur annual fees le rahe hain to school ka aisa tender wo hota hai hamare office mein bhi man lijiye award milte hain par wo ek alag separate cheez ho gaya haan office ke gift articles bhi jate hain mere paas se. Office mein jo gift articles jate hain wo bhi jate hain main brass ke wo flags vagerah ye army mein bhi chalte hain aur offices mein bhi office mein bhi chalte hain ye bhi karta hu. Aap apna number bata dijiye. Sir apna na aaj Wednesday hai Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday isko na do tarikh ko ek baar video meeting karte hain to abhi chal rahi hai to do agar video meeting rakhta hu mera number personal main aapko de raha hu save kar lo aap aur aap mujhe call karna main sir thoda sa na aadhe ghante lagenge par cheezon ko samajh ke kuch products dalenge aur naye naye main aapko bataunga kaise product aur badha sakte ho aapko sikha dunga to aap research karke aur dal sakte ho apne time mein main abhi apni taraf se dal dunga aur ek main aapko message bhi kar dunga apne personal number pe. Haan aur main samajh ke jo executive koi sincere executive ko dunga aur usko samjhaunga aise kaam karna hai full direction mein wo kaam karega fir ek mahine mein thoda improvement bhi lagega after uske baad aap ja sakte hain TrustSeal ki taraf TrustSeal aapko jana hi chahiye matlab mere hisab se aage chal ke. Ji bilkul bilkul kar lete hain bhaiya kar lenge. Aap mere ko ek baar apna number de dijiye. Main abhi just message kar raha hu sir Prabhat Singh hai mera save kar lijiye aap aapka naam kya hua sir shubh naam Shubham Shubham. Thik hai Shubham ji thik hai thik hai thank you sir thank you so much aapne apna time diya sir ek feedback mere liye aayega sir please us par apne hisab se feedback de dijiyega thank you main samjhata hu usko. Ji. Ho.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the quality of buyleads.

- Low quantity of buyleads.

- No buyleads for badges and tie belts.

- Profile not being updated properly.

- Receiving irrelevant calls for dead stock.



Resolution:

- Executive explained TrustSeal benefits.

- Executive offered a video meeting to understand issues.

- Executive offered to assign a sincere executive.

- Executive offered to add new products.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for the 2nd.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, profile, subscription, products
